keyword: how many calories is in a mcdonalds sausage biscuit
title: How Many Calories in a McDonald's Sausage Biscuit?
meta_description: Discover how many calories is in a mcdonalds sausage biscuit—430 kcal per serving—plus full nutrition breakdown, macros, and variations for your fast-food tracking.
h1: How Many Calories in a McDonald's Sausage Biscuit?
assumptions: Standard McDonald's Sausage Biscuit (pork sausage patty on buttermilk biscuit), no customizations; based on official U.S. nutrition data.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, preparation, and customizations; values from McDonald's official info. Check app or packaging for latest.

quick_answer.text: A McDonald's Sausage Biscuit contains 430 calories with 12 g protein and 34 g carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

faqs.q: How many calories is in a McDonald's sausage biscuit?
What's the protein in a McDonald's sausage biscuit?
faqs.a: About 12 g of protein per serving.

faqs.q: How much sodium is in a McDonald's sausage biscuit?
faqs.a: 860 mg of sodium, so watch intake if limiting salt.

faqs.q: Does a McDonald's sausage biscuit have trans fat?
faqs.a: 0 g trans fat, but 11 g saturated fat from the sausage and biscuit.

faqs.q: How do calories change with cheese on a sausage biscuit?
faqs.a: Adding cheese increases it to about 480 kcal.
